content.rendered:
Scenario Modeling

See Every Outcome.
Choose the Best One.

Easily model important equity decisions – before you make them.

Turn Your Uncertainty into
Smart Decision Making

Before Altshare

Making decisions based on manual data entry and modeling is just too complicated. Trying to keep track of employees, investors and all their shares in a spreadsheet – and then using that data to calculate scenarios. There's got to be a better solution.

After Altshare

With Altshare, you safely make decisions on the fly. Automatically model complex scenarios from funding rounds to exit as you grow and scale, all based on your existing cap tables. So you dodge those costly mistakes – before they happen.

request a demo

Your Best Case Scenario.
Every Time.

Waterfall in a Click

Always know where you stand when an exit or M&A opportunity comes around. Just input your projected exit value and timeline to instantly see the amount each share class walks away with. So you always know what's worth it, and what's not.

Waterfall in a Click

Always know where you stand when an exit or M&A opportunity comes around. Just input your projected exit value and timeline to instantly see the amount each share class walks away with. So you always know what's worth it, and what's not.

Raising the Bar

Empower every employee to take total control of their options. Now they sign, track, view and manage everything from vesting schedules to exercising in the Employee Portal. So they’re totally on board and bought in – from start to finish.

Raising the Bar

Empower every employee to take total control of their options. Now they sign, track, view and manage everything from vesting schedules to exercising in the Employee Portal. So they’re totally on board and bought in – from start to finish.

More Than
Just Numbers

See the effects of every change in real time with instantly updated results. Then visualize them with graphs and charts, so you don't miss a thing.

More Than
Just Numbers

See the effects of every change in real time with instantly updated results. Then visualize them with graphs and charts, so you don't miss a thing.

Make Shared Decisions

Engage shareholders and potential investors with clear, accurate scenario results. So everyone has a simple view of their potential returns and their stake in the company.

Make Shared Decisions

Engage shareholders and potential investors with clear, accurate scenario results. So everyone has a simple view of their potential returns and their stake in the company.

Founders Taking Ownership
of 409A

Inbal Myers
Director of Finance, Rapyd

“Instead of complex and expensive manual term sheet analysis, AltShare’s solution does it all automatically - cap table management, waterfall analysis, modeling…and more!”
Leeron Aran
VP Finance, Guesty

“AltShare’s 409A Valuation Solution is a game-changer for us. The fact that we can produce work paper-ready, defensible 409A valuations in less than an hour – and without hiring a consultant – is changing the way we handle our valuations.”
Roei Khermosh
CFO, Papaya Global

“AltShare helps me access my portfolio with a user friendly interface. I would suggest this product to any company that want's to offer stocks to their employees.”
Stephanie Pardo
CFO , Shift Technology

“Easy to navigate the equity management and platform which include a dashboard view and menu with features like updated cap table, ESOP Management, 409A valuations and more.”
Jonathan Eldan
VP Finance, LawGeex

“I like how this software generate all required reports, analyses and is user friendly. Very easy to run waterfall scenarios based on the company's cap table and also very easy to understand the graphs that are generated.”
Eli Kalman
VP Finance, WSC Sports Technologies

“Analytical tools are great. The software is also very flexible and allows for individual customization of many items.”
Tal Brener
CFO, Natural Intelligence

“AltShare is extremely friendly and flexible and helps me manage the employee’s equity in an easy efficient way, it saves overheads, improves accuracy and serve the variety of the corporate needs.”
Eyal Toledano
Co-Founder & CTO, Zebra Medical

“Altshare is a must have for any company looking to streamline the complex equity management process. Not only does it save us a ton of time, but it also provides our employees & shareholders a level of transparency that is unmatched.”
request a demo

Something For Every Scenario

Economic Rock (Bottom) Climbing
Main actions you can take to better handle your equity when your company struggles

Main actions you can take to better handle your equity when your company struggles, start the economic rock (bottom) climbing

Article

Helping you understand who should be asking for your cap table and what will they ask

Helping you decide who should run your cap table and manage your equity

Helping you decide who should run your cap table and manage your equity

Article
Making Angels Believe In You
How to show any investor you mean business by utilizing your commonly used management tools

Utilizing your everyday management tools in order to wow any investor or angel.

Read More
Article
From An Entrepreneur To A Founders Team In 3 Steps

This guild will show you how to create a founders Team of strong entrepreneurs in three manageable and appliable steps.

Read More
Article
Standing On The Shoulders Of Giants

Utilizing Elon Musk, Steve Jobs, Warren Buffett, and others to assist in building your startup from step one

Read More
Article

Get Your
Equity Done

request a demo
